name: rpi_eeprom_config
description: Comprehensive EEPROM configuration manager for Raspberry Pi 4/400/5/500/500+ and CM4/CM5.
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Configure Raspberry Pi bootloader EEPROM parameters including boot order, power management, USB settings, and debug options without command-line access.
volumio_info.changelog: Add RTC battery charging option for Pi 5/500+/CM5; store in userconfig.txt (survives OTA). i18n for all languages.
